answers.answer: High blood pressure is kind of the across the board indication of pre eclampsia. Swelling CAN be an indicator, but if it's occurring without hbp it's not as likely to be connected. I haven't heard of weight gain indicating pre eclampsia so I don't know about that but it's definitely something to bring up at a doc appointment if you're worried. I'm sure the doc is keeping an eye out for signs because that's pretty serious.

question: Im 35 weeks today and I am 169 pounds.. I was 110 when I was first pregnant... my legs are swelling and its very painful ..Could I have preeclampsia?
title: 35 weeks and gaining a lot of weight?
